failure.message: Step "ohjelma tulostaa tallessa olevat viitteet selkokielisinä" -- [, Enter 'addentry' to add an inproceedings BibTex entry, Enter 'print' to print a list of added content, Enter 'exit' to quit the program, , , Enter 'addentry' to add an inproceedings BibTex entry, Enter 'print' to print a list of added content, Enter 'exit' to quit the program, , , Enter 'addentry' to add an inproceedings BibTex entry, Enter 'print' to print a list of added content, Enter 'exit' to quit the program, ] doesn't contain ransum
